project.description: Build GTK Cairo library, including dependencies

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LIBCAIRO_TARBALL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Full filename of the tarball file; used when downloading, and when checking to see if it's already been downloaded

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
## UNPACK AND CONFIGURE LIBPIXMAN
# always unpack fresh source if [ -d pixman-${_LIBPIXMAN_VERSION} ]; then rm -rf pixman-${_LIBPIXMAN_VERSION} fi
tar -zxvf $SOURCE_DIR/$LIBPIXMAN_TARBALL
cd pixman-${_LIBPIXMAN_VERSION}
# now run Configure echo "Current directory is: $(pwd)" #./configure --prefix=${WORKSPACE}/pixman-${_LIBPIXMAN_VERSION}-bin ./configure --prefix=${WORKSPACE}/output
## BUILD AND TEST LIBPIXMAN cd pixman-${_LIBPIXMAN_VERSION} time make time make test time make install

## UNPACK AND CONFIGURE LIBCAIRO
# always unpack fresh source if [ -d cairo-${_LIBCAIRO_VERSION} ]; then rm -rf cairo-${_LIBCAIRO_VERSION} fi
# -J == xz compression tar -Jxvf $SOURCE_DIR/$LIBCAIRO_TARBALL
cd cairo-${_LIBCAIRO_VERSION}
# now run Configure echo "Current directory is: $(pwd)" # ./configure --prefix=${WORKSPACE}/cairo-${_LIBCAIRO_VERSION}-bin \ #PKG_CONFIG_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/pixman-${_LIBPIXMAN_VERSION}-bin/lib/pkgconfig \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/output/lib/pkgconfig \ ./configure --prefix=${WORKSPACE}/output \ --enable-xlib --enable-png
## BUILD AND TEST LIBCAIRO cd cairo-${_LIBCAIRO_VERSION} time make time make test TARGETS=xlib,xlib-render-0_0 time make install

## ARCHIVE BINARY BUILDS # -J == xz compression
# pixman #cd $WORKSPACE/pixman-${LIBPIXMAN_VERSION}-bin #tar -cJvf $WORKSPACE/libpixman-${_LIBPIXMAN_VERSION}.artifact.tar.xz .
# cairo #cd $WORKSPACE/cairo-${LIBCAIRO_VERSION}-bin #tar -cJvf $WORKSPACE/libcairo-${_LIBCAIRO_VERSION}.artifact.tar.xz .
ARTIFACT_TIMESTAMP=$(date +%Y.%j-%H:%m)
# create the artifact file and flag file cd $WORKSPACE/output touch libcairo-${_LIBCAIRO_VERSION}.${ARTIFACT_TIMESTAMP} # DON'T USE $PWD HERE, it captures the entire path, which is not what you want tar -cJvf $WORKSPACE/libcairo.artifact.tar.xz .
